metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14697 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
musl libc through 1.1.23 has an x87 floating-point stack adjustment imbalance, related to the math/i386/ directory. In some cases, use of this library could introduce out-of-bounds writes that are not present in an application's source code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

musl - 1.1.23-2build1
musl-tools - 1.1.23-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: musl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.23-2build1').
